snippet: The general manager of the Boston-area public transit system, Beverly Scott, resigned Wednesday amid commuter frustration over service disruptions during recent snowstorms that have pounded the region.
abstract: Beverly Scott, general manager of the Boston-area public transit system, unexpectedly resigns following angry reactions of commuters over service disruptions during recent snowstorms.
lead_paragraph: The general manager of the Boston-area public transit system, Beverly Scott, resigned Wednesday amid commuter frustration over service disruptions during recent snowstorms that have pounded the region.
